MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30am to make repairs to faulty overhead line equipment near to Woodfarm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.45am on 14th January 2021.
